comments.html: Outstanding content and well-framed positioning and analogy as always Ivan.  Amazing how everyone wants to blame Cisco and the network guys.  Per Ivan's point, Cisco and others provide all of the band-aids needed to overcome the server/app guys lack of innovation.  Extremely well stated.
comments.name: netwrkr95
